description: This is a source file for an Android application written in Kotlin. It defines 'VideoDetailsFragment', a UI fragment that displays detailed information about a video, including title, description, and controls for playing, resuming, and favoriting the video. It manages user interactions, updates UI based on stored progress and favorites, and communicates with its host activity via an interface.

classes.name: VideoDetailsFragment
classes.description: A Fragment class that displays video details and handles user interactions such as play, resume, and favorite toggling.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment and retrieves the Video object from arguments.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up event listeners, and starts collecting favorite status updates.

methods.name: formatTime
methods.description: Formats a duration in milliseconds into a human-readable MM:SS string.
